detail_desc: Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

KATE MORGAN x H&M. Shorts in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a contrasting colour trim with tassels at the front and covered elastication at the back of the waist. Diagonal side pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with covered elastication and decorative ties at the waist, side pockets and side stripes.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Sewn-in, patterned turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined V-neck, backless swimsuit with lace details at the top, ties at the back of the neck and padded cups with removable inserts.

Fully lined bikini bottoms a frill trim at the front, low waist and narrow ties at the sides.

Bikini top with flounces and underwired, moulded padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Double straps at the front that tie at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, side support and decorative gathers at the front. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Bow tie/tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.

Straight-cut top in jersey made from a linen and cotton blend with a ribbed collar, button placket, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.

Dungaree shorts in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back. Frill trims down the sides of bib section, an elasticated seam at the waist and a lined lower section. Narrow elastication and a frill trim around the hems, and press-studs at the crotch.

Dungaree shorts in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back. Frill trims down the sides of bib section, an elasticated seam at the waist and a lined lower section. Narrow elastication and a frill trim around the hems, and press-studs at the crotch.

Dungaree shorts in soft, marled sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and straps that cross at the back and have adjustable fasteners at the front. Kangaroo pocket with a print motif and appliqués, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a satin top and lace trims around the armholes. Narrow cut at the top with an opening front and back and concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Short shoulder straps, a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
